categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Solence was a male Human Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Cold War with the Galactic Republic, he served as an Overseer of Sith Academy on Korriban. Solence was killed in 3637 BBY by a Republic strike team during an assault on the Sith holy world.
